group_1.textRight: Hiking Quiz Rally...?

group_1.textLeft: You like hiking, don't you, Kokoro?

group_1.textRight: Uh... What...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]It's all good, everything's fine! Leave it to@me, okay?

group_1.textRight: But...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, what excellent timing! It's this weekend!

group_1.textRight: Um... Actually, it's awful timing...
I have to submit my assignments on Monday.
But the weather is so perfect... I wish@I could go.
What?

group_1.textLeft: You have plenty of time to work on them!@[chara:101700:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101700:cheek_0][chara:101700:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:101700:lipSynch_1]Especially with a genius like Masara.
[chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]She'll take care of those assignments for@you in the blink of an eye, right?

group_1.textRight: Uh...
You can't just tell us to cheat like that.
*Giggle* Yeah, she's right.
You're kind of like the guardian of us@Magical Girls, so you shouldn't say that.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101700:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]I'm still a peppy high schooler, you know...

group_1.textRight: Hiking, huh...? It has been a long time.
I wanted to try it with Masara...
Ha ha, never mind.
Just a selfish wish of mine. Donâ€™t worry@about it.
I know you're not into hiking.
Oh?@...[chara:301601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock][chara:301601:cheek_0][chara:301601:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:301601:lipSynch_1]Wait, what?
You would come with me? To go hiking?
Whoa, really?
Well, if that's the case, maybe I should@do it...
Huh?

group_1.textLeft: Study hard, play hard! You need to have@both work and fun.
It's important to have a balance of the two@in your life.

group_1.textRight: Hmmm...
Well then... [chara:301601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:301601:cheek_0][chara:301601:motion_100][chara:301601:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:301601:lipSynch_1]*Giggle* We definitely should@go!
[chara:302901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!
But why do you care so much, Mitama?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:101700:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]It's because I want the first place prize.

group_1.textRight: Huh... It says here...
If you place in the quiz rally, you'll win@a prize...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, it looks to be quite the serious rally,@doesn't it?

group_1.textRight: First place prize is [chara:301601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301601:cheek_0][chara:301601:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:301601:lipSynch_1]a 5 kilogram bag of@premium, high quality rice...?

group_1.textLeft: I'd never buy such fancy rice for myself,@you see.

group_1.textRight: You don't act like a high schooler at all...
She doesn't...
But this rice is for coming in first.
And the event seems like it's aimed more@at adults.
It might be tough to beat them...

group_1.textLeft: Kokoro, you're an experienced hiker...@And Masara has all the knowledge.

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*
Seems we have some high expectations@to meet.
